title: Are you for real...
body:
So this morning I woke up and played some ranked. First game somehow I dc so team remake, yay~ bye bye LP (note: riot took my privilege to earn loot, YAY~! ). Second game, the game itself destroys me take a look at the screenshot. (_Player name all messed up on tabs and only one team mate's icon is shown above the map_) FURTHERMORE the ping spiked and I was at constant 500 ping so i decided to re-login to fix the game and than what a **disaster ** i get kicked out from the game and my status says i'm not in a game?! Checking on oce.op.gg it says that i'm still in a ranked game?! Saw a similar post of this on the help and support boards (_Note: That post was my smurf!!!_) and Riot still hasn't commented! On my smurf when it happened the match history wasn't saved, how classic~. So now to summarize it happened to me twice now! Lost 40 or so LP today too, how fun. Might as well send a ticket for more complaints! 

Link to my smurf post: https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/KLJPo6gQ-holy-st
